knowledgeGraph.title: Asante Ashland Community Hospital
knowledgeGraph.description: Asante Ashland Community Hospital is a hospital in Ashland, Oregon, United States. Founded in 1907, it is part of the Asante Health System. In 2012, it explored an affiliation with Dignity Health, with the latter stopping negotiations in October 2012 over some resistance to the plan.

organic.title: Asante Ashland Community Hospital
organic.snippet: Asante Ashland Community Hospital, founded in 1907, is committed to improving the health of our patients and the communities we serve.

organic.title: Asante: Your trusted health partner for life
organic.snippet: We believe each person in our care must be treated with compassion, dignity, honesty & skill. Our 6000 employees work together to make this ideal a reality.
